scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run security
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:lint && npm run test && npm run build:dist
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:npm: curl -X GET http://registry.ecd.axway.int:8081/artifactory/local-npm/$npm_package_name/-/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz 2>/dev/null > $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz && npm publish --registry  https://registry.npmjs.org ./$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz && rm ./$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:publish: git add -A && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.security: npm run security:retire && npm run security:nsp
scripts.test: rimraf coverage .nyc-output && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --require babel-register ./test --recursive -R spec
